Articles.Content:
Does this happen to anyone else? And is it really annoying if you want you flag to face a certain direction say for a screen shot? I think it should be removed.

I.E. Give more control over the direction a flag is planted.
I agree 100%. I can never seem to predict which way my flag will be pointing.
Yeah, it's rather inconvenient, I think it has to match some sort of orientation regardless of which way the Kerbal faces, but I could be wrong.
